id: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified extensively to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).
name: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified extensively to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised as a part of the FIBO 2.0 RFC to introduce disjointness axioms to aid users in understanding.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised as a part of the FIBO 2.0 RFC to introduce disjointness axioms to aid users in understanding.

id: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified to eliminate deprecations that are more than 6 months old.
name: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified to eliminate deprecations that are more than 6 months old.

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to eliminate duplication with the concepts in LCC.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to eliminate duplication with the concepts in LCC.

id: system for allocating identifiers to roles that parties play
name: system for allocating identifiers to roles that parties play

id: This ontology extends the Commons Parties and Situations ontology with identifiers for party roles and very general tax identifiers.
name: This ontology extends the Commons Parties and Situations ontology with identifiers for party roles and very general tax identifiers.

id: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified to eliminate elements that have been deprecated for several quarters (FND-386).
name: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified to eliminate elements that have been deprecated for several quarters (FND-386).

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to address hygiene issues with respect to text formatting.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to address hygiene issues with respect to text formatting.

id: identifier assigned to a taxpayer that enables compulsory financial charges and other levies to be imposed on the taxpayer by a governmental organization in order to fund government spending and various public expenditures
name: identifier assigned to a taxpayer that enables compulsory financial charges and other levies to be imposed on the taxpayer by a governmental organization in order to fund government spending and various public expenditures

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to make hasRelatedPartyInRole symmetric and move hasMailingAddress from people to this ontology.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to make hasRelatedPartyInRole symmetric and move hasMailingAddress from people to this ontology.

id: identifies a physical address where an independent party can receive communications, including letters and packages
name: identifies a physical address where an independent party can receive communications, including letters and packages

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to add the two remaining property chains to complete the lattice, from independent party to thing via the situation, to simplify the class hierarchy for improved understanding, data mapping and alignment, and to add the notion of a contextual name (i.e., a name for someone, some place or something that applies for some period of time in some context).
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to add the two remaining property chains to complete the lattice, from independent party to thing via the situation, to simplify the class hierarchy for improved understanding, data mapping and alignment, and to add the notion of a contextual name (i.e., a name for someone, some place or something that applies for some period of time in some context).

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was extended to add the concepts of tax identifier and tax identification scheme.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was extended to add the concepts of tax identifier and tax identification scheme.

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was extended to rename 'hasPrimaryParty' to 'hasActiveParty' to be more consistent.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was extended to rename 'hasPrimaryParty' to 'hasActiveParty' to be more consistent.

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC) and to eliminate redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC) and to eliminate redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.

id: Tax identifiers are used for various tax-related purposes in the United States and in other countries under the Common Reporting Standard (CRS).
name: Tax identifiers are used for various tax-related purposes in the United States and in other countries under the Common Reporting Standard (CRS).

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised as a part of the issue resolutions identified in the FIBO FND 1.1 RTF report to add a parent of hasDate to date properties.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised as a part of the issue resolutions identified in the FIBO FND 1.1 RTF report to add a parent of hasDate to date properties.

id: identification scheme used to identify taxpayers in some jurisdiction
name: identification scheme used to identify taxpayers in some jurisdiction

id:
ontology structure
	(5) to incorporate changes to the specification metadata to support documentation at the family, specification, module, and ontology level, similar to the abbreviations.
	(6) to combine Parties, Party Roles, and Roles in a single, new, Parties module, combine Parties and Party Roles into a single ontology, and add an inverse for the hasParty property.
name:
ontology structure
	(5) to incorporate changes to the specification metadata to support documentation at the family, specification, module, and ontology level, similar to the abbreviations.
	(6) to combine Parties, Party Roles, and Roles in a single, new, Parties module, combine Parties and Party Roles into a single ontology, and add an inverse for the hasParty property.

id: sequence of characters, capable of uniquely identifying a party based on a specific role that they play in some context
name: sequence of characters, capable of uniquely identifying a party based on a specific role that they play in some context

id: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified to correct a wrong prefix on hasRole.
name: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified to correct a wrong prefix on hasRole.

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to add a relationship directly between parties and a party identifier and rename (migrate) the hasDefinition property to isDefinedIn to clarify intent.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to add a relationship directly between parties and a party identifier and rename (migrate) the hasDefinition property to isDefinedIn to clarify intent.

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was extended to align the properties holds and isHeldBy with the lattice to improve ownership-related reasoning.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was extended to align the properties holds and isHeldBy with the lattice to improve ownership-related reasoning.

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to add semantics to the definition of independent party, making it a direct subclass of autonomous agent (rather than inferred only) and making person and organization direct subclasses (rather than inferred only).
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was revised to add semantics to the definition of independent party, making it a direct subclass of autonomous agent (rather than inferred only) and making person and organization direct subclasses (rather than inferred only).

id: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was extended to support more complex situations involving parties in various roles, loosen the restriction on party in role with respect to commencement date, and to eliminate the redundant union in the definition of independent party.
name: Parties.rdf version of this ontology was extended to support more complex situations involving parties in various roles, loosen the restriction on party in role with respect to commencement date, and to eliminate the redundant union in the definition of independent party.

id: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.
name: Parties.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.
